actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 213 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain expenses of child adoption shall be treated as medical expenses.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, that specified expenses of child adoption shall be treated as medical expenses of a dependent of the taxpayer. Provides that the provisions of this Act shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 1973. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 213)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 213 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain expenses of child adoption shall be treated as medical expenses.
